title: AWS Cloud Fundamentals
subtitle: Master the foundational concepts of Amazon Web Services and build your cloud computing expertise from the ground up.

description: This comprehensive course is designed for beginners who want to understand cloud computing fundamentals and gain hands-on experience with AWS core services. You'll learn essential concepts, best practices, and practical skills needed to work with AWS in real-world scenarios.
By the end of this course, you'll be confident in deploying, managing, and optimizing AWS resources, and you'll be well-prepared for AWS certification exams.

achievements.text: Build and deploy applications on AWS

curriculum.title: Cloud Computing Basics
curriculum.description: Foundation knowledge of cloud computing and AWS fundamentals

curriculum.title: Identity & Access Management
curriculum.description: Security and access control in AWS

curriculum.title: Compute Services
curriculum.description: AWS compute services and instance management

curriculum.title: Storage Services
curriculum.description: AWS storage solutions and data management

curriculum.title: Networking
curriculum.description: AWS networking services and VPC configuration

curriculum.title: Database Services
curriculum.description: AWS database services and data storage

projects.title: Web Application Hosting
projects.description: Deploy a scalable web application using EC2, RDS, and ELB with proper security configurations.

projects.title: Serverless API
projects.description: Build a serverless REST API using Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB for a real-world application.

projects.title: Static Website with CDN
projects.description: Create a high-performance static website using S3, CloudFront, and Route 53 with custom domain.

requiredKnowledge: Basic networking concepts (helpful but not required)
requirements: AWS account (we'll help you set up)

enrollment.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your AWS Journey?
enrollment.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of students who have successfully launched their cloud careers with this course.

seo.title: AWS Cloud Fundamentals Course - Master AWS from Basics | VR IT Training
seo.description: Learn AWS Cloud Fundamentals with hands-on projects. Master EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda & more. Perfect for beginners. Get AWS certified with expert guidance.
seo.keywords: AWS training, cloud computing course, AWS fundamentals, AWS certification, cloud practitioner, AWS tutorial, serverless computing
seo.ogTitle: AWS Cloud Fundamentals - Complete Beginner's Course
seo.ogDescription: Master Amazon Web Services from ground up. Hands-on projects, expert guidance, certification preparation. Start your cloud career today!
seo.twitterTitle: AWS Cloud Fundamentals Course - Learn AWS from Scratch
